text: Leonel Mário d'Alva (born 22 July 1935) is a São Toméan politician. He was Prime Minister of São Tomé and Príncipe from 21 December 1974 until 12 July 1975, when the country gained independence from Portugal. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1935 births Category:Prime Ministers of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Heads of state of São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Leonel Mário d'Alva
